Name: Ascension VR
About the game: Now updated with the War of Shadows expansion and support for motion controls! Come try out the expansion with the devs, Tuesday nights at 8pm Pacific. Ascension VR is the first deckbuilding Virtual Reality experience. Bringing the tabletop world into the digital sphere by connecting players from all over the world into one virtual space, Ascension VR uses 3D fully animated avatars and showcases social elements including spatialized voice chat, avatar lip sync and avatar animation triggered by real time player movement. Players can battle for supremacy regardless of what platform theyâ€™re on, whether mobile or PC and from a variety of VR headsets, including Vive, and Rift. Ascension VR includes 52 Heroes, Constructs & Monsters Network Multiplayer across VR platforms Vive & Rift support Single player AI mode Social VR features: spatialized chat, lip and animation sync
